#include<cstdio>
#include<cstring>
#define FOR(i,x,n) for(int i=x;i<=n;i++)
#define size 100000
int a[size];
int getint()
{
int c = 'a';
while (!(c >= '0' && c <= '9') && c != '-') c = getchar_unlocked();
int c2;
if (c != '-')
c2 = c;
else
c2 = '0';
int res = 0;
while((c2 >= '0' && c2 <= '9'))
{
res = (res << 3) + (res << 1) + (c2 - '0');
c2 = getchar_unlocked();
}
return res * (c == '-' ? -1 : 1);
}
 
int main()
{
int t;t=getint();//scanf("%d",&t);
while(t--)
{
int n,M,C;
n=getint();M=getint();C=getint();//scanf("%d%d%d",&n,&M,&C);
FOR(i,0,n-1)
a[i]=getint();//scanf("%d",&a[i]);
int max=a[0];
FOR(i,1,n-1)
if(a[i]>max)
max=a[i];
 
int ANS=0;
FOR(i,1,max)
{
int ans=0;
FOR(j,0,n-1)
            {
            int temp,piece;
            if(a[j]>=i)
                       {
                       if(a[j]%i==0)
                                    {
                                     piece=a[j]/i;
                                     temp=a[j]*M-C*(piece-1);
                                     }
                       else
                                     {
                                      piece=a[j]/i;
                                      temp=i*piece*M-C*piece;
                                      }
                      if(temp>0) ans+=temp;
                      }
              }
        
if(ans>ANS) ANS=ans;
}
 
printf("%d\n",ANS);
}
 
return 0;
}
